ModMetaData.name: [JDS] Star Wars BlasTech Industries
ModMetaData.author: JangoD'soul
ModMetaData.description:
This mod add StarWars Weapons into Rimworld
Note: No CE patch, if you want to make it be my guess
[h1]Features:[/h1] -Blastech Workbench -DC-17 Blaster Pistol -DC-17M Blaster -DC-17B Blaster Pistol -DC-15A Blaster Rifle -DC-15S Blaster Carbine -DC-15x Sinper Rifle -E-5 Blaster_Rifle -Z6 Rotary_Blaster_Cannon -B-2 Wrist Blaster -B-2 Wrist Cannon -E-5S Sniper Rifle -SE-14 Light Blaster Pistol -EE-3 Carbine Rifle -Westar-M5 -Westar-34 -Westar-35 -Amban Rifle -Mando Blaster Carbine -Heavy Mando Weapon
[h1]Crafting Requirements[/h1] -Craftable at Blastech Workbench -Research Requirements: Blastech Weapons
[h1]Credits:[/h1] -Preview art inspires by "Star Wars - Factions" - DC-17M_Blaster Art by: Survivalmaster
